Html:
In Windows 7/8 if you do "Ctrl + Alt + Tab" it shows a floating window with the opened applications that you can then click on any of them to bring it into view.  This is the code I'm trying to use:

 

InputSimulator.SimulateModifiedKeyStroke(new[] { VirtualKeyCode.LCONTROL, VirtualKeyCode.LMENU, VirtualKeyCode.TAB}, null );

 

I've done something very similar that is working with "Ctrl + Windows Key + Tab" that is working (see below), but I can't seem to get the above code to work.

InputSimulator.SimulateModifiedKeyStroke(new[] { VirtualKeyCode.CONTROL, VirtualKeyCode.LWIN, VirtualKeyCode.TAB }, null);

Any ideas?
Have you applied the patch I submitted here? http://inputsimulator.codeplex.com/workitem/13002
